company.introduction: Ecological Technology LLC has been providing camp and catering services that comply with environmental safety, hygiene, and quality management standards since 2011. We reach our customers and clients wherever they are, even in remote geographical locations far from urban areas, prioritizing their comfort by establishing both stationary and mobile camps to meet their needs.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: We aim to be a leading company by continuously increasing our productivity and contributing to the value and international competitiveness of our customers through eco-friendly and high-quality products and services.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: We will lead sustainable development and become a company providing products and services that meet international standards.

values.title: Values
values.leadershipDescription: We continuously increase our market position by innovating, fostering strong relationships, and creating a company culture built on vision and appropriate management.
values.qualityDescription: We implement and maintain international standards in our operations.
values.safetyDescription: We prioritize safety and food hygiene throughout every step of our processes, always keeping people at the forefront.
values.sustainabilityDescription: We lead by ensuring sustainable growth and spearheading sustainable development.

2011.title: Company Foundation
2011.description: Ecological Technology LLC was founded in 2011.

2012.title: 200 Capacity Camp Facility
2012.description: In 2012, a fully equipped 2-story camp facility with a capacity of 200 people, including accommodation, catering, and laundry services, was commissioned.

2015.title: New Camp in Darkhan-Uul
2015.description: In 2015, a camp was established in the Zoost Gold Mine area of Darkhan-Uul province.

2017.title: Camp for Bayan-Undarga Mine
2017.description: In 2017, a ger camp was set up to accommodate 120 workers at the Bayan-Undarga Mine.

2020.title: Expansion and New Project
2020.description: In 2020, the camp was expanded to accommodate 200 people and equipped with a greywater recycling treatment plant. We also initiated and successfully led the “Undraa” bottled water project.

2022.title: Catering Services
2022.description: In 2022, we started managing catering services at the auto base of Ogoot LLC in Nalaikh District, and in May, we began managing catering at the auto base of MERA LLC in Bayanzurkh District.

2023.title: Food Factory Project
2023.description: In 2023, we initiated technological research for a food factory project that meets HACCP, GMP, and GHP standards.

2024.title: Future Vision
2024.description: In 2024, we aim to become a leading company that provides eco-friendly products and services that meet international standards.
